### Notation

- Scalars: lower-case letters \\(v,m\\)
- Vectors: boldface lower-case letters \\(\mathbf{v}\\)
- Matrices: boldface capital letters \\(\mathbf{M}\\)
- \\(i\\)th element of a vector \\(\mathbf{v}\\): \\(v_i\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->
- \\((i,j)\\)-element of a matrix \\(\mathbf{M}\\): \\(m_{ij}\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->
- \\(i\\)th row of a matrix \\(\mathbf{M}\\): \\(\mathbf{m}_{i:}\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->
- \\(j\\)th column of a matrix \\(\mathbf{M}\\): \\(\mathbf{m}_{:j}\\) <!-- .element: class="fragment" data-fragment-index="1" -->

### Matrix Operations
- the **inner product** is \\(\langle u,v \rangle := \sum_{l=1}^L u_{l} v_l\\)
where \\(u\in\Re^L\\) and \\(v\in\Re^L\\)
- the **outer product**  \\( u \otimes v \\) between vectors \\(u\in\Re^N\\) and \\(v\in\Re^M\\) is the \\(N\times M\\) matrix with elements \\(u_nv_m\\), \\( n=\{1,\cdots,N\} \\) and \\(m= \{1,\cdots,M\} \\).
- the **outer product** for matrices \\(\mathbf{U} \in\Re^{N\times L} \\) and \\(\mathbf{V} \in \Re^{L \times M} \\), \\( \mathbf{U} \otimes \mathbf{V} := \sum_{\ell=1}^L \mathbf{U}_{:\ell} \otimes \mathbf{V}_{\ell:} \\)
- the element-wise **Hadamard product**
